name: Colorfy: Coloring Games
description:
Colorfy is an art and coloring game designed to help you kill time, relax your mind and have fun. The coloring game comes in the form of a coloring book with multiple designs to choose from. You will find complex and simple art like mandalas, animals, patterns and florals in the coloring book.

We made this game to help you relax and reduce the daily stress that can make people feel depressed, upset and unproductive. Science has proven the benefits of coloring. It makes people happy, helps them to overcome stress and also brings out their creativity.

The traditional method of coloring is tiring. With our game, you don't have to worry about taking care of a book or pencil. Go digital and enjoy our coloring game which is not only very fun but also very easy to use.

Our coloring app is updated from time to time, with simple and complicated designs for people of all ages. Download Colorfy today and have fun.
